title: [6 YoE, Unemployed, Graphic Design, United States]
text:
Morgan Stock
Experienced Graphic Designer

I am a goal-oriented and well-organized graphic designer with experience in packaging, print, and digital design. My skills lie in producing engaging and appealing content for companies and products alike. Though I work efficiently on my own, I thrive in a team-driven environment, and I am seeking a creative role with a like-minded company to further expand my experience!

SKILLS

Branding
• Created and maintained brand standards via guidelines. Used these guidelines to create many assets for clients and companies including PowerPoints, Slides, case studies, white papers, and exhibition/tradeshow assets.

Adobe Creative Suite
• Highly proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Lightroom. Utilize these apps on a daily basis for graphic design, print layout, and photography.

Prepress Design
• Prepared digital files for print - including page layout, reformatting for different die-lines, proper layer and file names, and succinctly packaging files for the printers.

Photography
• Highly skilled photographer of 10 years, with expertise in portraiture, product and event photography for companies.

Marketing
• Skilled in social media and B2B marketing with a license in Inbound Marketing via Hubspot Academy. Experience in copy writing and KPI analysis.

Web Design
• Experienced in WordPress, Hubspot, CMS, and CSS.

Project Management
• Strong organization skills, with a talent for balancing high-volume workloads and cross-functional communication.
Utilizes several different project management softwares including Monday, Trello, Slack, and Microsoft Office
depending on what clients and companies prefer.

Soft Skills
• Cross-functional Communication; Creative Thinking; Unique Problem-Solving Solutions, Quick Turnaround Time.

CONTACT & PORTFOLIO
Online Portfolio: morganstock.design
LinkedIn Profile: linkedin.com/in/morganstock
Email: morgan.stock@example.com
Phone Number: (404) 555-0137

EXPERIENCE

Graphic Designer, Pine & Alloy Creative
Octavia Street Studio
October 2023 - October 2024
• Designed print and digital assets for direct mail, B2B LinkedIn ads, and company branding. Skilled in cross-functional collaboration, managing high-volume projects with quick turnaround times, and supporting company culture through event planning and team-building.

Graphic Designer, Peachtree Arts & Print Collective
October 2022 - June 2023
• Designed digital and print assets for local Atlanta non-profits and businesses, with expertise in print design, exhibition signage, and photography. Strong communication skills, adept in task management and file-sharing tools, and experienced in handling high-volume projects efficiently.

Content Creator, Southline Social Studio
June - August, 2022
• Created posts and copy for social media channels including Instagram and Twitter. Participated in styling, directing, and executing product photoshoots for photos and videos.

Graphic Designer & Marketing Manager, Harborlight Packaging Co.
September 2019 - May 2022
• Designed print and digital assets for social media and email marketing, packaging design, exhibition signage, and brand awareness. Skilled in product and event photography, WordPress website development, and delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines while maintaining strong cross-functional communication.

EDUCATION

Bachelor of Arts
Major in Visual Arts
Concentration in Photography,
Minor in Marketing
Atlanta College of Art & Design
2014 - 2018
